ProductInfo.Features:
Indoor/ Outdoor Security Camera;420 TV Lines, Horizontal;1/4"SONY Super HAD CCD;3.6mm lens selectable.
See in the Dark up to 15m with Automatic Night Vision; IR LEDs: 12pcs;IR Irradiation Distance: 15m.
Two Type Video Out: TV Monitor BNC Output and PC Monitor VGA Output;Signal System: NTSC / PAL.
Support live view, parameter setting and copy playback video via network.
Support Remote View via Smart Phone & 3G Mobile with each of those systems below: a) iPhone b) Blackberry c) Windows Mobile d) Symbian e) Google Android.
ProductInfo.Name: KARE CCTV 4CH Surveillance Security DVR 4 Waterproof Outdoor Sony CCD Cameras System IR Camera with Night Vision Support Email Alarm Motion Detected Smartphone View
